verses:
Alleluia.  Praise the Lord, for he is good:  for his mercy
endureth for ever.
Praise ye the God of gods:  for his mercy endureth for ever.
Praise ye the Lord of lords:  for his mercy endureth for ever.
Who alone doth great wonders:  for his mercy endureth for ever.

Who made the heavens in understanding:  for his mercy endureth
for ever.

Who established the earth above the waters:  for his mercy
endureth for ever.
Who made the great lights:  for his mercy endureth for ever.
The sun to rule the day:  for his mercy endureth for ever.

The moon and the stars to rule the night:  for his mercy endureth
for ever.

Who smote Egypt with their firstborn:  for his mercy endureth
for ever.

Who brought out Israel from among them:  for his mercy endureth
for ever.

With a mighty hand and with a stretched out arm:  for his mercy
endureth for ever.

Who divided the Red Sea into parts:  for his mercy endureth for
ever.

And brought out Israel through the midst thereof:  for his mercy
endureth for ever.

And overthrew Pharao and his host in the Red Sea:  for his mercy
endureth for ever.

Who led his people through the desert:  for his mercy endureth
for ever.
Who smote great kings:  for his mercy endureth for ever.
And slew strong kings:  for his mercy endureth for ever.
Sehon king of the Amorrhites:  for his mercy endureth for ever.
And Og king of Basan:  for his mercy endureth for ever.

And he gave their land for an inheritance:  for his mercy
endureth for ever.

For an inheritance to his servant Israel:  for his mercy
endureth for ever.

For he was mindful of us in our affliction:  for his mercy
endureth for ever.

And he redeemed us from our enemies:  for his mercy endureth for
ever.
Who giveth food to all flesh:  for his mercy endureth for ever.

Give glory to the God of heaven:  for his mercy endureth for
ever.

Give glory to the Lord of lords:  for his mercy endureth for
ever.
